reviewText: Too much time staring at waves and flowers to recommend this.  Traveling to SA in a week.  This gives a general idea of the Garden Route.  All the information I acquired could have been had in about 3 minutes.

I really enjoyed this DVD. The views were good, with a good variety of landscapes to enjoy. There might have been shots of Knoetsie Castle and Belvedere Church, but I shall not hold this against the producers of this very enjoyable disc. There are interesting legends attached to these two buildings. Maybe they are more than legend.

Altogether a very enjoyable disc to watch and reminisce over.
